subject: RE: [junit] About Testing the Exception
msgSnippet: There has been a long discussion about this topic with pros and cons during the last month. There is also a third alternative in which you let the framework
messageBody:
There has been a long discussion about this topic with pros and cons during the last month. There is also a third alternative in which you let the framework take care of all the unexpected exceptions. The code is easier to write but not as informative:

// success
public int testxxx throws Exception()
{
code
}

// failure
public int testxxx throws Exception()
{
try
{
code
fail()
}
catch(aException aex)
{}
}

/Håkan
